thread.title: Amanda Constantinides
thread.title_full: Public Storage reviewed by Amanda Constantinides

author: Amanda Constantinides
title: Amanda Constantinides
text: Pam gave me excellent customer service during check-in. The facility seems very secure and I like having a personal gate code. I got a great deal by reserving my unit online, and they have very convenient payment options going forward. I'm very pleased with this Public Storage location so far.
